Ford-moz://a Open Web Fellow. Passionate about information security.

Used to be techie at "The People's NSA" (Organized Crime and Corruption Reporting Project).

Contributed to a couple of worldy-known open source projects such as elementary OS and the Tor Project.


I write things in my free time.
